snippet: Jerryd Bayless scored 13 of his 17 points in the fourth quarter, coming off the bench to help the Memphis Grizzlies overcome Goran Dragic's 33 points in a 99-91 win over the Phoenix Suns on Thursday night....

headline.print_headline: Bayless Spurs Grizzlies to 99-91 Win Over Suns
headline.main: Bayless Spurs Grizzlies to 99-91 Win Over Suns

lead_paragraph: Jerryd Bayless scored 13 of his 17 points in the fourth quarter, coming off the bench to help the Memphis Grizzlies overcome Goran Dragic's 33 points in a 99-91 win over the Phoenix Suns on Thursday night.
